message: Let's be fair, Bob. A slightly better deal for me in this round, and we both avoid losses from inflation.

I'm willing to be fair, but I think we can both do better than last round.  Let's split it 55/45, with me getting the larger share this time to make up for the potential inflation.  We'll avoid any losses and both get a good deal!

Bob, let's be realistic.  The longer this goes on, the less we both get.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Take the deal now before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
